verses.name: Genesis 27:12
verses.text: My father peradventure will feel me, and I shall seem to him as a deceiver; and I shall bring a curse upon me, and not a blessing.

verses.name: Genesis 27:13
verses.text: And his mother said unto him, Upon me be thy curse, my son: only obey my voice, and go fetch me them.

verses.name: Genesis 27:14
verses.text: And he went, and fetched, and brought them to his mother: and his mother made savoury meat, such as his father loved.

verses.name: Genesis 27:15
verses.text: And Rebekah took goodly raiment of her eldest son Esau, which were with her in the house, and put them upon Jacob her younger son:
